analysis.description:
SpecialERC20 (/unique_chucks/12/0x7b739522132b57492a92d5cf7769f9482b3f77c3.sol#214-217) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/12/0x7b739522132b57492a92d5cf7769f9482b3f77c3.sol#214-217)

DecentralizedExchanges.cancelOrder (/unique_chucks/12/0x7b739522132b57492a92d5cf7769f9482b3f77c3.sol#299-329) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(info.token).transfer(msg.sender,remain) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7b739522132b57492a92d5cf7769f9482b3f77c3.sol#312-313)

DecentralizedExchanges.sell (/unique_chucks/12/0x7b739522132b57492a92d5cf7769f9482b3f77c3.sol#330-378) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(info.token).transfer(info.owner,tradeAmount) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7b739522132b57492a92d5cf7769f9482b3f77c3.sol#373-374)

DecentralizedExchanges.purchase (/unique_chucks/12/0x7b739522132b57492a92d5cf7769f9482b3f77c3.sol#382-411) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(info.token).transfer(msg.sender,tradeAmount) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7b739522132b57492a92d5cf7769f9482b3f77c3.sol)
